Type::Coercion::Union(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Type::Coercion::Union(3)

NAME

Type::Coercion::Union - a set of coercions to a union type constraint

STATUS

This module is covered by the Type-Tiny stability policy.

DESCRIPTION

This package inherits from Type::Coercion; see that for most documentation. The major differences are that "add_type_coercions" always throws an exception, and the "type_coercion_map" is automatically populated from the child constraints of the union type constraint.

BUGS

Please report any bugs to <http://rt.cpan.org/Dist/Display.html?Queue=Type-Tiny>.

SEE ALSO

Type::Coercion.

Moose::Meta::TypeCoercion::Union.
